EmailTemplate.subject: Forrester Study reveals what to consider to get the most out of your hybrid cloud deployments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Are you taking full advantage of your hybrid cloud capabilities? A hybrid cloud strategy leads to increased infrastructure efficiency, greater flexibility to meet changing requirements, and faster software delivery cadence. But these only come when you carefully consider the requirements for a hybrid approach.
We invite you to read the newly published Forrester study, Hybrid Cloud Demands Consistency <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/hybrid-cloud-demands-consistency-forrester?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=ar-forrester-hybrid-cloud-q218]]> to learn what 100 IT professionals, leaders, and practitioners said about creating the most successful hybrid cloud strategy. Commissioned by Pivotal and Microsoft, this study gives you a look at the challenges and benefits of hybrid cloud.
Download the report here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/hybrid-cloud-demands-consistency-forrester?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=ar-forrester-hybrid-cloud-q218]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
